name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Automation Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in automation QA, CI/CD practices, and test automation strategies, ensuring robust and reliable software delivery. Proficient in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Jenkins**, and **Ansible**, I implement seamless automation pipelines that enhance productivity and integrate best QA practices. My extensive programming knowledge in **Python**, alongside familiarity with **Bash** and **Groovy**, empowers me to troubleshoot, debug, and optimize systems efficiently within **Linux** environments.
I hold a strong background in developing high-performance solutions in diverse sectors, including healthcare and finance. My expertise in modern tech stacks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**, combined with a solid foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, allows me to contribute to comprehensive automation frameworks. Additionally, my hands-on experience with deployment strategies and tools like **Behave** and **Playwright** reinforces my capability to deliver quality software that resonates with industry standards.
